title: VSSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 17 Scientist/Engineer SC Posts
description: The Vikram Sarabhai Space Centre (VSSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 17 Scientist/ Engineer SC Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B.Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the VSSC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit...
